returns.isSafe: true if the vault is safe, false if the vault can be liquidated.

params._vaultId: The id of the vault. 0 means that it creates new vault.

setOperator(address).details: Only operator can call this function.

updateIRMParams((uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Only operator can call this function.

updateYearlyPremiumParams((uint256,uint2.details: Only operator can call this function.

params._premiumParams: New interest rate model parameter for variance calculation

withdrawProtocolFee(uint256,uint256).details: Only operator can call this function.

closeVault(uint256,(bool,bool,bool,bool,.notice: Closes all positions in a vault.

getRange(bytes32).notice: Returns a Liquidity Provider Token (LPT) data

getSqrtPrice().notice: Gets square root of current underlying token price by quote token.

getTokenState().notice: Returns the status of supplied tokens.

getUtilizationRatio(bytes32).notice: Returns the utilization ratio of Liquidity Provider Token (LPT).

getVaultStatus(uint256,uint160).notice: Returns values and token amounts of the vault.

isVaultSafe(uint256).notice: Returns the flag whether a vault is safe or not.

updateYearlyPremiumParams((uint256,uint2.notice: Updates interest rate model parameters for premium calculation.

userdoc.notice: Error Codes P1: caller must be vault owner P2: vault does not exists P3: caller must be operator P4: cannot create vault with 0 amount P5: paused P6: unpaused P7: tx too old P8: too much slippage P9: invalid interest rate model
